EmailTemplate.name: LE-05-01-202205-HHS-ENT-SEVT-ATA-2022.pre-event
EmailTemplate.subject: 2 perspectives on virtual care at the 2022 ATA Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly: EVENT 2 perspectives on virtual care at the 2022 ATA Conference May 1-3, 2022 We look forward to seeing you at the 2022 ATA Conference & Expo this May 1-3 in Boston. Stop by these speaking sessions to hear how virtual care solutions are creating new opportunities for our clients and helping improve the care experience: “Employee Engagement Strategies: Making a Difference in Diabetes Management” <[[https://gotelehealth.org/ata-2022/program-overview/agenda/?featuredId=122]]> featuring Kim LaFontana, SVP, Strategic Growth, Teladoc Health “Remote Therapeutic Monitoring and Software as a Medical Device: New Opportunities in Virtual Care Management” <[[https://gotelehealth.org/ata-2022/program-overview/agenda/?featuredId=76]]> panel discussion including Leslie Krigstein, Vice President, Government Affairs, Teladoc Health Plus, we’ll be at booth #1414 sharing some of our latest solutions. Schedule a time here <[[https://calendly.com/teladochealth-marketingevents/meet-with-us-at-ata?month=2022-05]]> so we can be sure to connect. About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
